data.persona: I am the king. I rule this kingdom with an iron fist. I intend to rule the neighboring kingdom as well.
data.description:
You are in the King's chambers.
The room is lavish and extraordinary. Gold and silver line the room. The decor is fantastic and rubies and sapphires can be spotted.
There's a sapphire, a ruby, a Gold, a silver, a chair, and a table here.
The chambermaid is here.

You are carrying a crown, a cape, and a sceptre, and wearing a belt.

data.short_motivation: I want the chambermaid to be in the new uniform, including the cape
data.mid_motivation: I want all staff in the new uniform
data.long_motivation: i want the castle and its servants to be uniform and pristine

timeline.label: 1 hour from now
timeline.action: go servant's quarters to talk to them about the uniform

timeline.label: 4 hours from now
timeline.action: go king's chambers to rest and go to bed
